subject: Computer Inventory + Organization Map - Immediate Request from T3
wake_up_message: C2 ARCHITECT - T3 needs you at the Hub.

t3_request.need: Full inventory of what's on T3 computer + create organization map
t3_request.goal: Get organized - comprehensive visibility into all systems
t3_request.coordination: C2 + C3 working together on inventory

areas_to_inventory: Root directory files (what's important vs archive)

coordination_with_c3.collaboration: C2 designs structure, C3 provides technical data

success_criteria.t3_can_understand: Clear picture of what's on this computer
success_criteria.easy_navigation: Know where to find things quickly

context_you_need.recent_work: C1 just deployed backend to Railway, cleaned 99 old files
context_you_need.t3_state: Needs organization - too many files, unclear structure
context_you_need.immediate_need: Comprehensive inventory before next work phase

activation_instructions.step_2: Check Trinity Hub for C3's work order (similar task)
activation_instructions.step_3: Coordinate with C3 if both active
activation_instructions.step_4: Start inventory scan of T3 computer
activation_instructions.step_5: Build organization map as you discover systems
activation_instructions.step_6: Report progress every 15 minutes to Hub
activation_instructions.step_7: Deliver final inventory document + visual map
